body_html:
That could happen soon. Although, I'm not sure how to set the whole thing up with bazel. I currently use SBT as my build tool and I assume that libtensorflow.so is in "LD_LIBRARY_PATH".

I will soon make my repository public and we can see how to go about integrating it in the main repository, then.

body:
That could happen soon. Although, I'm not sure how to set the whole thing up with bazel. I currently use SBT as my build tool and I assume that libtensorflow.so is in "LD_LIBRARY_PATH".

I will soon make my repository public and we can see how to go about integrating it in the main repository, then.
